name: Avoid Functions and Procedures  not having variable declared on a separate line (PL1)
description: This rule searches for PL1 Main Procedures, PL1 Functions and PL1 Procedures not having variables declared on a separate line
output:
The report lists all the PL1 Main Procedures, PL1 Functions and PL1 Procedures not having variables declared on the separate lines.

It provides following information: 
-  PL1 Main Procedures, PL1 Functions and PL1 Procedures full name
rationale: Not grouping variables improve the facility to modify the attributes of one of them.
remediation: The best practice is to code only one variable per line.
remediationSample:
DCL TEST1  BIN FIXED(31);
DCL TEST2  BIN FIXED(31);
total: Number of the PL1 Main Procedures, PL1 Functions and PL1 Procedures
